General.Name: Shareate Tools Ltd
General.Description: Shareate Tools Ltd. manufactures and sells cemented carbide products and drilling tools in China. The company offers mining tungsten carbide products, including tungsten carbide insert, carbide substrate, shield machine tool, coal cutter pick, and tungsten carbide tubular electrode; precision components; cutting tools; tungsten carbide die products, such as carbide plates, cold headings, hobs, and powder metallurgy dies; and cermet products. It also provides rock drilling tools, including mining tricone bits; DTH hammer and hammer bits; single roller bits; roller cutters, horizontal directional drilling bit; and water well bits. tri-cone drill bits, water well bits, down-the-hole (DTH) hammers, and DTH hammer bits. The company exports its products to approximately twenty countries. The company was formerly known as Kingdream Shareate Tools Ltd. and changed its name to Shareate Tools Ltd. in May 2012. Shareate Tools Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Suzhou, China.
